meanings.sent1: The two boys got into a stoush over a toy.
meanings.sent2: The stoush between the two teams was intense.
meanings.sent3: During the playground stoush, everyone ended up laughing.
meanings.sent4: The political debate turned into a stoush of words.
meanings.sent5: The stoush in the movie was so realistic, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: To engage in a physical fight or brawl.
meanings.sent1: The kids decided to stoush it out in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The siblings often stoush over who gets to use the computer first.
meanings.sent3: I never expected my cats to stoush over a piece of string.
meanings.sent4: The two rival gangs stoushed in the alley behind the school.
meanings.sent5: The characters in the book stoushed with courage and determination.
